title: Breast Cancer - Wisconsin
description: Dataset for breast tumor diagnosis. Predict diagnosis: B = benign, M = malignant. Features are computed from a digitized image of a fine needle aspirate (FNA) of a breast mass. They describe characteristics of the cell nuclei present in the image.

id.name: id
id.description: A unique identifier for each sample in the dataset.

target.name: diagnosis
target.description: A binary variable indicating the diagnosis of the breast tissue (M = malignant, B = benign).

features.name: radius_mean
features.description: mean radius (mean of distances from center to points on the perimeter)

features.name: texture_mean
features.description: mean texture (standard deviation of gray-scale values)

features.name: perimeter_mean
features.description: mean perimeter

features.name: area_mean
features.description: mean area

features.name: smoothness_mean
features.description: mean smoothness (local variation in radius lengths)

features.name: compactness_mean
features.description: mean compactness (perimeter^2 / area - 1.0)

features.name: concavity_mean
features.description: mean concavity (severity of concave portions of the contour)

features.name: concave points_mean
features.description: mean concave points (number of concave portions of the contour)

features.name: symmetry_mean
features.description: mean symmetry

features.name: fractal_dimension_mean
features.description: mean fractal dimension ("coastline approximation" - 1)

features.name: radius_se
features.description: std. error of  radius (mean of distances from center to points on the perimeter)

features.name: texture_se
features.description: std. error of  texture (standard deviation of gray-scale values)

features.name: perimeter_se
features.description: std. error of  perimeter

features.name: area_se
features.description: std. error of  area

features.name: smoothness_se
features.description: std. error of  smoothness (local variation in radius lengths)

features.name: compactness_se
features.description: std. error of  compactness (perimeter^2 / area - 1.0)

features.name: concavity_se
features.description: std. error of  concavity (severity of concave portions of the contour)

features.name: concave points_se
features.description: std. error of  concave points (number of concave portions of the contour)

features.name: symmetry_se
features.description: std. error of  symmetry

features.name: fractal_dimension_se
features.description: std. error of  fractal dimension ("coastline approximation" - 1)

features.name: radius_worst
features.description: worst (largest)  radius (mean of distances from center to points on the perimeter)

features.name: texture_worst
features.description: worst (largest)  texture (standard deviation of gray-scale values)

features.name: perimeter_worst
features.description: worst (largest)  perimeter

features.name: area_worst
features.description: worst (largest)  area

features.name: smoothness_worst
features.description: worst (largest)  smoothness (local variation in radius lengths)

features.name: compactness_worst
features.description: worst (largest)  compactness (perimeter^2 / area - 1.0)

features.name: concavity_worst
features.description: worst (largest)  concavity (severity of concave portions of the contour)

features.name: concave points_worst
features.description: worst (largest)  concave points (number of concave portions of the contour)

features.name: symmetry_worst
features.description: worst (largest)  symmetry

features.name: fractal_dimension_worst
features.description: worst (largest)  fractal dimension ("coastline approximation" - 1)
